CustomField.description: When ticked, it means that the Page Setting was customly created in the Local Development Library and does not come within any of the default Libraries (FieloPLT, FieloELR, FieloPRP).
CustomField.inlineHelpText: When ticked, it means that the Page Setting was customly created in the Local Development Library and does not come within any of the default Libraries (FieloPLT, FieloELR, FieloPRP).
CustomField.label: Custom
